alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:40PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Denver County through 415 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout tornado over northeastern Denver International Airport, or 18 miles northeast of Denver, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Landspout tornadoes can damage mobile homes, roofs, vehicles, and trees. Outdoor objects may be tossed about. Locations impacted include... Northern Aurora, eastern Commerce City, Denver International Airport and D.I.A Terminal and Concourses. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
